item.title: 美元走稳使日元濒临 160 点
item.description: 周三美元坚挺，徘徊在 160 日元关口的悬崖边上，因为投资者转为谨慎，并为本周末公布的美国物价数据倒计时。【原文：The dollar was firm on Wednesday and trading on the precipice of the 160 yen barrier as investors turned cautious and counted down to the release of U.S. price data at the end of the week.】

item.title: 行业组织报告美国库存增加后，石油走低
item.description: 周三亚市早盘，油价下跌，此前一个行业组织报告称美国库存意外增加，加剧了人们对美国这个第一大石油消费国需求低于预期的担忧。【原文：Oil prices fell in early Asian trade on Wednesday after an industry group reported a surprise jump in U.S. stockpiles, fueling concerns about weaker-than-expected demand in the top oil consuming nation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行称政策具有限制性，给家庭带来痛苦
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周三表示，货币政策具有限制性，目前的现金利率给许多家庭带来了经济上的痛苦，但不排除在必要时进一步收紧货币政策以抑制通胀的可能性。【原文：Australia's central bank said on Wednesday that monetary policy was restrictive with the current cash rate causing financial pain for many households, but it could not rule out further tightening if necessary to tame inflation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司任命新首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚星空娱乐集团（Star Entertainment Group）周三表示，史蒂夫-麦肯（Steve McCann）已被任命为集团首席执行官兼常务董事，自 7 月 8 日起生效。【原文：Australia's Star Entertainment Group said on Wednesday Steve McCann has been appointed as its group CEO and Managing Director, effective July 8.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁将于第四季度开始交付受阿隆索启发设计的赛车 Valiant
item.description: 阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）周三宣布了其新款限量版跑车Valiant的首次亮相，并表示将于第四季度开始交付，这家英国汽车制造商的目标是重振下滑的销量并实现现金流的正增长。【原文：Aston Martin announced the debut of its new limited edition sportscar Valiant on Wednesday and said deliveries would start in the fourth quarter, as the British carmaker aims to revive falling sales and become cash flow positive.】

item.title: 新加坡港口拥堵显示红海袭击的全球连锁影响
item.description: 自 COVID-19 大流行以来，新加坡集装箱港口的拥堵情况达到了最严重的程度，这表明为躲避红海袭击而进行的长期船只改道已经扰乱了全球远洋运输，其他亚洲和欧洲港口也出现了瓶颈。【原文：Congestion at Singapore's container port is at its worst since the COVID-19 pandemic, a sign of how prolonged vessel re-routing to avoid Red Sea attacks has disrupted global ocean shipping - with bottlenecks also appearing in other Asian and European ports.】

item.title: 贝莱德董事在与萨巴的代理权争夺战中保住了六家基金的席位
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）周二公布的数据显示，在投资公司萨巴资本管理公司（Saba Capital Management）未能获得足够票数更换董事或解雇基金经理后，贝莱德上周仍保有六只封闭式基金的董事会席位。【原文：BlackRock held onto board seats at six closed end funds last week after investment firm Saba Capital Management did not secure enough votes to replace directors or fire the fund manager, according to data released by BlackRock on Tuesday.】

item.title: OpenAI 推迟到七月推出 "语音模式
item.description: ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 周二表示，由于技术问题，该公司将把 "语音模式 "功能的发布时间推迟一个月，至 7 月份。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI said on Tuesday that it was delaying the release of its "Voice Mode" feature by a month to July because of technical issues.】

item.title: 美国司法部称，中石油将因违反美国出口规定支付 1450 万美元罚款
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，中石油旗下的中石油美国公司（PetroChina International America）已同意就违反美国出口法的行为支付总计 1,450 万美元的罚款和没收财产。【原文：PetroChina International America, a unit of PetroChina , has agreed to pay a fine and forfeiture totaling $14.5 million for violations of U.S. export law, the Justice Department said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 16 位诺贝尔经济学奖得主称特朗普政策将加剧通胀
item.description: 16 位诺贝尔经济学奖获得者周二联名写信警告说，如果共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普赢得 11 月份的美国总统大选，美国和世界经济将遭受损失。【原文：Sixteen Nobel prize-winning economists signed a letter on Tuesday warning that the U.S. and world economy will suffer if Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump wins the U.S. presidential election in November.】

item.title: 早间竞标：弹性与季末谨慎
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 康涅狄格州消防员就据称受污染的装备起诉杜邦、3M 和霍尼韦尔公司
item.description: 杜邦公司、3M 公司、霍尼韦尔公司和其他 16 家被告于周二被康涅狄格州的消防员告上法庭，称他们的防护装备被与癌症有关的有毒 "永久化学品 "污染。【原文：DuPont , 3M , Honeywell and 16 other defendants were sued on Tuesday by Connecticut firefighters who said their protective gear was contaminated by toxic "forever chemicals" linked to cancer.】

item.title: KKR 从 Quarterra 收购价值 21 亿美元的住宅房地产资产组合
item.description: 本周二，KKR 以约 21 亿美元的价格从开发商 Quarterra Multifamily 发起的封闭式基金手中收购了 18 个多户住宅房地产资产组合。【原文：KKR acquired a portfolio of 18 multifamily residential real estate assets on Tuesday from a closed end fund sponsored by developer Quarterra Multifamily for about $2.1 billion.】

item.title: 通用汽车自动驾驶部门 Cruise 任命新首席执行官，寻求扭亏为盈
item.description: 通用汽车公司机器人出租车部门 Cruise 周二表示，已任命一名前 xBox 创始工程师担任该公司自动驾驶汽车公司的新首席执行官。【原文：General Motors robotaxi unit Cruise said on Tuesday it has named a former xBox founding engineer as the new CEO of automaker's self-driving vehicle company.】

item.title: 联邦快递预计 2025 财年利润高于预期，原因是成本削减；股价跳涨
item.description: 联邦快递周二预计，2025 年的利润将高于分析师的预期，预计今年计划的成本削减将带来利润率的增长，即使收入仍然受到包裹运输需求低迷的挑战。【原文：FedEx forecast 2025 profit above analysts' estimates on Tuesday, anticipating that the cost reductions planned for the year would deliver margin gains even as revenue remains challenged by lackluster demand for parcel shipping.】

item.title: 大众汽车将向电动汽车制造商 Rivian 投资高达 50 亿美元，作为技术合资企业的一部分
item.description: 德国汽车制造商大众汽车集团（Volkswagen Group）周二表示，将向美国电动汽车制造商 Rivian 投资高达 50 亿美元，作为双方平等控制的新合资企业的一部分，以共享电动汽车架构和软件。【原文：German automaker Volkswagen Group will invest up to $5 billion in U.S. electric-vehicle maker Rivian as part of a new, equally controlled joint venture to share EV architecture and software, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Reddit 将更新网络标准以阻止自动网站搜索
item.description: 社交媒体平台 Reddit 周二表示，将更新该平台使用的一项网络标准，以阻止从其网站上进行自动数据搜刮，此前有报道称，人工智能初创公司正在绕过该规则为其系统收集内容。【原文：Social media platform Reddit said on Tuesday it will update a web standard used by the platform to block automated data scraping from its website, following reports that AI startups were bypassing the rule to gather content for their systems.】

item.title: 消息人士称，RTX 公司的柯林斯正在商谈放弃与美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的国际空间站宇航服合同
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的人士透露，RTX 公司的子公司柯林斯宇航公司正在与美国国家航空航天局（NASA）谈判，希望退出为国际空间站宇航员制造新宇航服的合同，从而使该机构对已有几十年历史的宇航服进行现代化改造的计划受挫。【原文：RTX Corp subsidiary Collins Aerospace is in talks with NASA to back out of its contract to build new spacesuits for astronauts on the International Space Station, setting back the agency's bid to modernize its decades-old spacesuits, according to two people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，克拉里奥秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，为制药商提供软件的克拉里奥公司已秘密申请在美国首次公开募股，目标估值超过 100 亿美元。【原文：Clario, a software provider for drugmakers, has confidentially filed for an initial public offering in the United States and is targeting a valuation of more than $10 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 备忘录称 CDK 经销商软件不可能在 6 月底前恢复
item.description: 根据路透社周二看到的一份备忘录，CDK Global 预计由网络攻击引发的经销商管理软件的持续中断不会在本月底前恢复，全美的经销商都在使用该软件。【原文：CDK Global does not expect the cyber attack-led ongoing outage in its dealer management software, which dealers across the United States use, to be restored before the end of the month, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: ELFA 称，5 月份美国商业设备借款增长 11
item.description: 美国设备租赁与融资协会（ELFA）周二称，与一年前相比，5月份美国公司的设备投资融资借贷增加了11%。【原文：U.S. companies borrowed 11% more to finance equipment investments in May compared to a year ago, industry body Equipment Leasing and Finance Association (ELFA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大庞巴迪公司工人将继续罢工，工会拒绝公司提议
item.description: 加拿大工人工会 Unifor 周二表示，在拒绝了庞巴迪公司提出的所谓 "最终建议 "后，该工会成员将继续目前的罢工行动。【原文：Canadian workers' union Unifor said on Tuesday its members at Bombardier will continue their ongoing strike action after rejecting, what it called, a "final proposal" from the business-jet maker.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚称，如果罢工继续，法国炼油厂可能停工
item.description: 埃克森美孚石油公司周二表示，如果罢工工人继续阻挠其进入法国北部的格拉文雄炼油厂，该公司可能需要暂停生产。【原文：ExxonMobil may need to suspend production at its Gravenchon refinery in northern France if striking workers continue to block access to the site, the oil major said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人工智能股票将对罗素重组产生巨大影响
item.description: 投资者正在为周五富时罗素（FTSE Russell）最终重组基准指数做准备，人工智能（AI）相关股票在过去一年中的大幅上涨预计将对其最终形态留下深刻印象。【原文：Investors are gearing up for the final reconstitution of the benchmark indexes by FTSE Russell on Friday, with the furious rally in artificial intelligence (AI) related stocks over the past year expected to leave an outsized imprint on their final shape.】

item.title: 据 The Verge 报道，谷歌将在 8 月 13 日的发布会上展示人工智能和新款 Pixel 手机
item.description: 根据 The Verge 和科技评论员马克斯-布朗利（Marques Brownlee）在网上分享的邀请函，谷歌将在 8 月 13 日举行的一次特别活动上展示人工智能功能以及 Pixel 设备和安卓平台的更新。【原文：Google will showcase artificial intelligence features, and updates to its Pixel devices and the Android platform at a special event on Aug. 13, according to invites shared online by the Verge and tech commentator Marques Brownlee.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，Doordash 曾与英国 Deliveroo 就收购事宜进行谈判
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，美国送餐集团 Doordash 最近表示有意收购英国 Deliveroo。【原文：U.S. meal delivery group Doordash recently flagged its interest in a takeover of Britain's Deliveroo , two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: Waymo 的自动驾驶打车服务现已在旧金山向所有人开放
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的 Waymo 公司周二表示，其自动驾驶打车服务 Waymo One 现已在旧金山向所有人开放，而在亚利桑那州凤凰城采取类似举措近四年后，这项服务也已在旧金山开放。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo said on Tuesday its autonomous ride-hailing service, Waymo One, is now available to everyone in San Francisco, nearly four years after a similar move in Phoenix, Arizona.】

item.title: Albemarle 关注锂价格，但认为长期需求强劲
item.description: 全球最大的锂生产商 Albemarle 公司的一位高管周二表示，该公司对目前用于制造电动汽车电池的金属的价格感到担忧，但相信长期需求将保持强劲。【原文：Albemarle , the world's largest lithium producer, is concerned about current prices for the metal used to make electric vehicle batteries but believes long-term demand will remain strong, an executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 萨巴的温斯坦称美国总统拜登对债券市场 "更有利
item.description: 著名投资经理博阿兹-温斯坦（Boaz Weinstein）周二表示，11月美国总统大选的不确定性可能会导致市场波动，但他同时也表示，乔-拜登总统对债券市场来说 "更好"。【原文：Prominent investment manager Boaz Weinstein on Tuesday said uncertainty about November's U.S. presidential election may lead to market volatility but also said President Joe Biden is "better" for the bond market.】

item.title: 受制裁船舶集团 Sovcomflot 表示制裁损害了海上安全
item.description: 受制裁的俄罗斯航运集团 Sovcomflot 首席执行官表示，对航运公司的制裁正在破坏海上安全，并由于船舶标准受到影响而给贸易带来危险。【原文：Sanctions on shipping companies are undermining safety at sea and pose dangers for trade as ship standards are impacted, the chief executive of sanctioned Russian shipping group Sovcomflot said.】
